roleset.name: chopping sloppily

example.name: all args
example.text: Mary's hacking the Thanksgiving turkey with a dull ttable knife really irritated John, who considered himself a master carver.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on hack.01. Corresponds to VNcls build-26.1, cut-21.1-1.

roleset.name: removing pieces

example.name: all args
example.text: John's hacking pieces out of the dining room table with a tiny axe really angered Mary.
example.arg: out of the dining room table

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on hack.03. Corresponds to VNcls split-23.2.

roleset.name: breaking into, as on a computer

example.name: arg2
example.text: News International has agreed to admit , in selected cases , liability for phone hacking .

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: A Florida man pleaded guilty today to a series of cyber-related crimes relating to his hacking into the personal e-mail accounts of more than 50 individuals associated with the entertainment industry.
example.arg: into the personal e-mail accounts of more than 50 individuals associated with the entertainment industry

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, hack.04. No VNcls.

roleset.name: coughing

example.name: typical
example.text: Michael got up at 11:00 last night and was running a slight fever in addition to his hacking all night.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on hack.05. No VNcls.

roleset.name: hacking_away: chopping sloppily, phrasal

example.name: Whoa.
example.text: For a few heartbeats Master Cook regards me with wild eyes, then he resumes his hacking away at the turnips.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on hack.02, which is based on hack.01. See associated VNcls.
